scenario.name: UAC IMS
scenario.send: MESSAGE sip:[$requestURI];transport=[transport] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];rport;branch=a[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: <sip:[$from]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[$to]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 MESSAGE Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: text/plain Content-Length: [len] Hello!

MESSAGE sip:[$requestURI];transport=[transport] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];rport;branch=a[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: <sip:[$from]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[$to]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 MESSAGE Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: text/plain [authentication] Content-Length: [len] Hello!
